title: Frontend Developer
tagline: Build beautiful and interactive user interfaces for the web.
description: Frontend developers create the user-facing side of websites and applications that users interact with directly. This roadmap will guide you through the essential technologies and concepts required to become a modern frontend developer.

path.title: HTML & CSS Foundations
path.description: Learn the fundamental building blocks of all websites, focusing on structure and style.
path.project: Build a personal portfolio website from scratch with responsive design.

path.title: JavaScript Core
path.description: Master the language of the web to create dynamic and interactive user experiences.
resources: freeCodeCamp: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
path.project: Create a weather application that fetches data from a public API and saves user preferences.

path.title: Version Control with Git
path.description: Learn to manage your code, track changes, and collaborate effectively with other developers.
path.project: Host your portfolio website on GitHub Pages and implement continuous deployment.

path.title: React Fundamentals
path.description: Build powerful, component-based single-page applications with the most popular UI library.
resources: React for Beginners by Wes Bos
Epic React by Kent C. Dodds
path.project: Rebuild your portfolio using React components with proper routing and state management.

path.title: State Management
path.description: Learn to manage complex application state across components.
path.project: Add state management to your React app with Redux Toolkit or Context API.

path.title: Styling in React
path.description: Explore modern ways to style your applications for a professional look and feel.
resources: CSS-Tricks: A Complete Guide to CSS-in-JS
path.project: Implement a consistent design system for your React application using Tailwind CSS or a component library.

path.title: Testing
path.description: Ensure your application works as expected with automated tests.
resources: Testing JavaScript by Kent C. Dodds
path.project: Write comprehensive tests for your React application components.

path.title: Performance Optimization
path.description: Make your application fast and efficient for the best user experience.
path.project: Optimize your React application focusing on load time and rendering performance.

path.title: Build & Deploy
path.description: Learn how to bundle your application for production and deploy it to the web.
path.project: Set up a CI/CD pipeline and deploy your optimized React application to a production environment.

title: Backend Developer
tagline: Power the applications and databases that run behind the scenes.
description: Backend developers create the server-side logic that powers web applications. They work with databases, server configurations, APIs, and application logic that enables the frontend to function.

path.title: Programming Foundations
path.description: Master the core programming concepts that apply across languages.
resources: Clean Code by Robert C. Martin
path.project: Implement common data structures and algorithms in your language of choice.

path.title: Node.js Fundamentals
path.description: Learn to build fast and scalable server-side applications with JavaScript.
path.project: Build a simple web server that serves static files and handles basic routes.

path.title: Express.js Framework
path.description: Create robust APIs and web applications with the most popular Node.js framework.
path.project: Build a complete REST API with CRUD operations for a resource (e.g., blog posts, products).

path.title: Database Fundamentals
path.description: Understand the principles of data storage and retrieval.
path.project: Design a database schema for an e-commerce application with multiple related entities.

path.title: Working with MongoDB
path.description: Master the most popular NoSQL database for modern web applications.
resources: The Complete Developer's Guide to MongoDB
path.project: Connect your Express API to MongoDB and implement complete data persistence.

path.title: SQL Databases with PostgreSQL
path.description: Learn to work with relational databases for structured data.
path.project: Implement a data layer for your API using PostgreSQL and Sequelize.

path.title: Authentication & Security
path.description: Learn to secure your application and manage user access.
path.project: Implement secure user authentication with JWT, role-based access control, and proper validation.

path.title: API Testing & Documentation
path.description: Ensure your APIs work as expected and are well-documented.
path.project: Write comprehensive tests for your API and create detailed API documentation.

path.title: Deployment & DevOps
path.description: Deploy your backend application to production and manage its lifecycle.
path.project: Containerize your application with Docker and deploy it to a cloud provider with CI/CD.

path.title: Scaling & Architecture
path.description: Learn advanced concepts for building large-scale applications.
path.project: Refactor part of your application into microservices and implement caching.

title: Data Scientist
tagline: Uncover insights and predict future trends from complex data.
description: Data scientists extract knowledge and insights from structured and unstructured data using scientific methods, algorithms, and systems. They combine skills in statistics, programming, and domain expertise to solve complex problems.

path.title: Python for Data Science
path.description: Master the essential Python libraries for data manipulation and analysis.
path.project: Analyze a public dataset (e.g., Titanic survival data) using Pandas with clear insights.

path.title: Data Visualization
path.description: Learn to create compelling visualizations to communicate your findings effectively.
resources: Storytelling with Data by Cole Nussbaumer Knaflic
path.project: Create an interactive dashboard visualizing insights from a complex dataset.

path.title: Statistics & Mathematics
path.description: Build the foundational knowledge required for understanding machine learning algorithms.
resources: Seeing Theory: Visual Introduction to Probability
path.project: Conduct a complete statistical analysis of a dataset with hypothesis testing and confidence intervals.

path.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
path.description: Master the process of investigating datasets to discover patterns and anomalies.
path.project: Perform comprehensive EDA on a messy real-world dataset and prepare it for modeling.

path.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
path.description: Understand the core concepts of machine learning and build your first models.
resources: Machine Learning Crash Course by Google
path.project: Build and compare multiple models on a classification problem with proper evaluation metrics.

path.title: Advanced Machine Learning
path.description: Dive deeper into sophisticated machine learning techniques and algorithms.
path.project: Build a competition-grade model using ensemble techniques with hyperparameter tuning.

path.title: Deep Learning
path.description: Explore neural networks and their applications in complex data problems.
resources: Deep Learning by Goodfellow, Bengio, and Courville
path.project: Build a convolutional neural network for image classification on a custom dataset.

path.title: Natural Language Processing
path.description: Work with text data to extract meaning and build language-based applications.
path.project: Build a sentiment analysis model and deploy it as a simple API.

path.title: Big Data & Spark
path.description: Learn to process and analyze large-scale datasets that exceed the capacity of single machines.
path.project: Process a large dataset using PySpark and perform distributed machine learning.

path.title: Deployment & MLOps
path.description: Move your models from development to production with best practices.
path.project: Deploy a machine learning model as a RESTful API with monitoring and version control.

title: DevOps Engineer
tagline: Automate and streamline the software development lifecycle.
description: DevOps engineers bridge the gap between software development and operations, enabling organizations to build, test, and release software faster and more reliably. They focus on automation, infrastructure as code, and continuous integration/delivery.

path.title: Linux & Command Line Essentials
path.description: Master the operating system that powers most servers and cloud infrastructure.
resources: Linux Command Line and Shell Scripting Bible
The Linux Command Line by William Shotts
path.project: Create a collection of bash scripts to automate common system administration tasks.

path.title: Networking Fundamentals
path.description: Understand how computers communicate in modern distributed systems.
path.project: Set up a secure network with multiple subnets and proper security rules.

path.title: Version Control with Git
path.description: Learn to manage code changes efficiently and collaborate with development teams.
path.project: Set up a complete Git workflow with branching strategy, CI integration, and code review process.

path.title: Cloud Computing: AWS
path.description: Master the foundational services of the most popular cloud platform.
resources: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Study Guide
path.project: Design and deploy a highly available web application architecture on AWS.

path.title: Infrastructure as Code
path.description: Automate the provisioning and management of infrastructure through code.
resources: Infrastructure as Code: Managing Servers in the Cloud
path.project: Create a complete infrastructure as code solution for a multi-tier application with proper state management.

path.title: Configuration Management
path.description: Automate the configuration and management of servers and environments.
path.project: Create Ansible playbooks to configure and manage a fleet of servers with different roles.

path.title: Containerization with Docker
path.description: Package applications and dependencies into standardized units for development and deployment.
path.project: Containerize a multi-service application with proper networking, volumes, and optimization.

path.title: Container Orchestration with Kubernetes
path.description: Automate deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
path.project: Deploy a microservices application to Kubernetes with proper scaling, networking, and storage.

path.title: CI/CD Pipelines
path.description: Build automated pipelines for continuous integration and delivery of software.
path.project: Create a complete CI/CD pipeline with automated testing, security scanning, and blue-green deployments.

path.title: Monitoring & Observability
path.description: Implement systems to track performance, availability, and troubleshoot issues in production.
path.project: Set up a comprehensive monitoring solution for a distributed application with dashboards and alerting.

title: Game Developer
tagline: Bring immersive worlds and interactive stories to life.
description: Game developers create interactive experiences that entertain, educate, and engage players across multiple platforms. This career combines programming, art, design, and storytelling into cohesive gaming experiences.

path.title: Programming Fundamentals
path.description: Build a solid foundation in programming concepts essential for game development.
resources: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
path.project: Create simple command-line games to practice programming concepts like Tic-Tac-Toe or Hangman.

path.title: Unity Engine Fundamentals
path.description: Learn one of the most popular and versatile game engines in the industry.
resources: Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D Course
path.project: Create an interactive 3D scene with basic gameplay elements like collectibles and obstacles.

path.title: Game Programming with C#
path.description: Master the primary scripting language for Unity to bring your game to life.
resources: Learning C# by Developing Games with Unity
path.project: Create a character controller with advanced movement, jumping, and interaction capabilities.

path.title: 2D Game Development
path.description: Learn the specific techniques for creating engaging 2D games.
path.project: Build a complete 2D platformer game with levels, enemies, and collectibles.

path.title: 3D Game Development
path.description: Master techniques for creating immersive 3D game worlds.
path.project: Create a 3D adventure game with exploration, interaction, and basic combat.

path.title: Game UI & UX Design
path.description: Design intuitive interfaces and smooth user experiences for players.
path.project: Design and implement a complete game UI including menus, HUD, and inventory system.

path.title: Audio for Games
path.description: Add immersive sound to enhance the player experience.
path.project: Create a dynamic audio system for your game with adaptive music and environmental sounds.

path.title: Game Design Principles
path.description: Learn the theory and practice of creating engaging gameplay.
resources: The Art of Game Design: A Book of Lenses
Level Up! The Guide to Great Video Game Design
path.project: Design and document a complete game concept with mechanics, levels, and progression.

path.title: Optimization & Performance
path.description: Ensure your game runs smoothly across different hardware.
path.project: Optimize a game to run at 60 FPS on target hardware with performance profiling.

path.title: Publishing & Monetization
path.description: Learn to ship your game to players and potentially generate revenue.
path.project: Prepare a game for release on a platform of your choice with proper settings and assets.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
tagline: Protect digital assets and defend against cyber threats.
description: Cybersecurity analysts protect organizations from digital threats by monitoring systems, identifying vulnerabilities, responding to incidents, and implementing security measures to safeguard sensitive information and infrastructure.

path.title: Computer & OS Fundamentals
path.description: Build a solid understanding of computing systems that need protection.
path.project: Set up a secure dual-boot system with hardened configurations for both operating systems.

path.title: Networking Fundamentals
path.description: Understand the protocols and infrastructure that attackers target.
path.project: Set up a small network with proper segmentation and analyze traffic with Wireshark.

path.title: Cybersecurity Principles
path.description: Learn the core concepts and frameworks of information security.
path.project: Develop a comprehensive security policy for a small organization with risk assessment.

path.title: Security Tools & Technologies
path.description: Get hands-on with essential tools used by security professionals.
path.project: Perform a comprehensive security assessment of a vulnerable machine (like DVWA or Metasploitable).

path.title: Vulnerability Assessment
path.description: Learn to identify and evaluate security weaknesses systematically.
resources: Mastering Kali Linux for Advanced Penetration Testing
The Art of Software Security Assessment
path.project: Conduct a full vulnerability assessment of a web application and produce a professional report.

path.title: Threat Intelligence
path.description: Gather and analyze information about current and emerging threat actors and their tactics.
path.project: Set up a threat intelligence platform and integrate multiple threat feeds for analysis.

path.title: Security Operations & Monitoring
path.description: Monitor systems for security incidents and respond effectively.
resources: The Practice of Network Security Monitoring
path.project: Set up a SIEM solution, create detection rules, and respond to simulated security incidents.

path.title: Cloud Security
path.description: Secure assets and workloads in cloud environments.
path.project: Implement and audit security for a multi-tier application in a public cloud environment.

path.title: Cryptography & PKI
path.description: Understand the mathematical foundations of secure communications.
path.project: Set up a complete PKI infrastructure with a certificate authority and implement secure communications.

path.title: Incident Response & Forensics
path.description: Learn to respond to security breaches and investigate them thoroughly.
resources: NIST Computer Security Incident Handling Guide
path.project: Perform a complete incident response and forensic analysis for a simulated security breach.
